Godwin Chukwunaenye Ezeemo // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ n'afọ Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri ise na anọ ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onyeisi oche nke The Orient Group nke ụlọ ọrụ na onye otu Progressive Peoples Alliance.
A mụrụ Ezeemo na Umuchu, n'ime agbụrụ Igbo, n'afọ Otu puku na narị itoolu na iri ise na anọ
Ọ gara St Peter's Secondary School na Achina, bu kilomita iri na ise site n'ụlọ ya ma ojiri ukwu aga ya kwa ụbọchị. O nwetara OND na HND na Marketing na Federal Polytechnic, Ilaro.

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị mahadum, Ezeemo debanyere aha ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, nke toro n'ime Orient Group, nke gụnyere Orient Export Ltd; Sokka International; Orient Feeds Mill and Farms Ltd; Orient Magazines, Newspaper and Communication Ltd; Orient Global Waterwell Limited; Union Haulage Ltd; Orient Mega FM; na Multipurpose Computer Centre.
Ọbu onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Ezeemo haziri mmemme n'ógbè ya iji kwalite Iso Ụzọ Kraịst ma ịjụ okpukpe ndị obodo. O guzobekwara Charity (Ezeemo) Trust maka ndị onwero ka ọ ghaha..
